text.*:
Banner of IATSE Local 28, Portland, Oregon, at a union rally

This is a list of Locals of the International Alliance of Theatrical Stage Employees.

Contents

  • 1 USA National locals
  • 2 Hollywood/Los Angeles area locals
  • 3 New York City area locals
  • 4 New England area locals
  • 5 San Francisco Bay Area locals
  • 6 Chicago area locals
  • 7 Florida state locals
  • 8 Other US locals
  • 9 Canada locals
  • 10 Locals in numerous areas
  • 11 References
